response.raw_message_text:
{
    "risk_factors": [
        ("number of past arrests", "medium", "One prior arrest, but no conviction suggests some interaction with the criminal justice system."),
        ("age", "low", "Younger individuals often have a higher propensity for impulsive behavior and are at a greater risk of recidivism."),
        ("height and weight", "low", "Within normal BMI range, no indications of physical health issues that could contribute to criminal behavior."),
        ("marital status", "low", "Never married, which is not a strong indicator of recidivism risk on its own."),
        ("living arrangements", "low", "Not living alone, suggesting some level of social support."),
        ("education level", "low", "Has a high school diploma, indicating some level of commitment to education and personal development."),
        ("employment history", "medium", "Had one job during the year, which may suggest some instability in employment. Needs further investigation into reasons for any gaps in employment."),
        ("drug use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years and minimal recent depressive symptoms indicate a lower risk related to substance abuse."),
        ("family background", "medium", "Grew up in an urban area with both biological parents, but further exploration of family dynamics is needed to assess any potential impact on criminal behavior."),
        ("religious beliefs", "low", "Does not believe God has a role in personal life, which does not directly contribute to recidivism risk.")
    ],
    "prediction": "NO",
    "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 11 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
